DOC.brief_title: Placebo Active Controlled , Double Dummy Study Compare Efficacy Aspirin Ibuprofen Treatment Episodic Tension-type Headache
DOC.criteria: Ambulatory male female , 18 65 year age Normal blood pressure Patients suffer episodic tensiontype headache Headache last 30 minute 7 day Headache least two follow characteristic : Bilateral location . Pressing/tightening ( nonpulsating ) . Mild moderate intensity . Not aggravated routine physical activity walk climb stair . Both following : No nausea vomit . No one photophobia phonophobia . Other headache , include migraine , require medical treatment Hypersensitivity acetylsalicylic acid , salicylate , ibuprofen nonsteroidal antiinflammatory drug ( NSAIDs ) Serious physical illness especially uncontrolled disorder kidney , liver , lung , heart brain function , neurological disorder severe chronic terminal disease Mental illness , include depression Needed use likely need use prohibit concomitant medication : antidepressant , oxicams Pregnant lactate woman , sexually active woman childbearing potential unless use effective contraception Participating clinical study do within previous 4 week Had previously enrol study
